components.name: Ray Docker Container
components.description: A containerized environment for running Ray applications, providing isolation and dependency management.

components.name: CI/CD Pipeline
components.description: Automated workflows for building, testing, and deploying Ray applications, ensuring code quality and integration.

components.name: Dependency Set Manager
components.description: Manages and resolves dependencies for Ray applications, ensuring that all required packages are available.

components.name: Buildkite Integration
components.description: Integration with Buildkite for continuous integration and deployment, facilitating automated testing and deployment processes.

data_flows.description: The CI/CD pipeline builds and deploys applications into the Ray Docker Container for execution.
The Dependency Set Manager provides the CI/CD pipeline with the necessary dependencies for building Ray applications.
Buildkite triggers the CI/CD pipeline to initiate builds and tests based on code changes.

trust_boundaries.name: Container Isolation Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Isolates the Ray Docker Container from the host system and other containers to prevent cross-contamination.

trust_boundaries.name: CI/CD Pipeline Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates the CI/CD pipeline from the development environment to ensure that only validated code is deployed.
